Spider-Man (2002)

The shy student Peter Parker (Tobey Maguire) is bitten by a radioactive spider, giving him amazing and unique super powers. But with time he learns that with such forces, is also a big responsibility. Peter swears to dedicate his life to fighting crime. The Green Goblin, who's real name is Norman Osborn (Willem Dafoe), is Spider Man's arch-enemy. He received his demonic personality after a chemical experiment exploded in his face. The special formula increased his intelligence and strength but also made him mad.

Spider-Man 2 (2004)

Two years have passed since the quiet Peter Parker was hit by the disaster that was to change his life and gave him a very special gift / curse.

Desperate, he tries to find balance in life between a living as a university student and the secret identity as a superhero, he must constantly live with. He is tormented by having to carry her secret alone, and that it constantly poses a threat to the people he loves. His boundless love for Mary Jane (Kirsten Dunst) is growing stronger and Peter is constantly faced with the dilemma of whether to tell her about his secret life or not. The friendship with Harry Osborn (James Franco) is complicated by his growing bitterness and hatred of Spider-Man - who is responsible for Harry's father's death. Even Peter's beloved Aunt May, as a personal struggle after her husband Ben's death, begins to doubt his nephew.

Spider-Man 3 (2007)

is a turbulent adventure of secrets, vengeance, love and reconciliation. The same successful team in the two previous audiences and critics successes of Spider-Man has collected and worked on Spider-Man 3, both behind and in front of the camera.

Peter Parker finally manage to find a balance between his love for MJ and his duties as a superhero. His newly discovered self-confidence is, however, to the test when he meets the two most feared opponents ever, whose evil powers and the thirst for revenge threaten Peter and everyone he loves.
